name: Lolo
short_title: Cosy Spanish spot for octopus, devilled eggs and cocktails
address: 102 Bermondsey St, London SE1 3UB, United Kingdom
summary: Lolo is a cosy Spanish restaurant on Bermondsey Street known for a date-night vibe, strong cocktails and wine, and a menu that leans into seafood and rich sharing plates. Reviews frequently highlight standout dishes like octopus and devilled eggs, alongside Basque cheesecake and other desserts. Some diners flag value concerns, occasional service inconsistency and noise at peak times.
what_diners_love: Cosy, stylish atmosphere often described as perfect for date night
Devilled eggs frequently mentioned as a favourite
atmosphere_experience: Cosy, warm and intimate with an elevated Spanish feel—well suited to date nights. Some reviews mention it can get noisy when busy.
mixed_feedback: Value concerns: price vs portion size comes up repeatedly
Some diners describe flavours as ‘normal’ or bland
Occasional service delays or inconsistency reported
Noise mentioned by a few reviewers
top_tip: Order the octopus and devilled eggs, and save room for Basque cheesecake. If value matters, choose a few best-hit dishes rather than ordering widely.
